languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g}, закончив свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, находится вне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g} свидетеля, свидетель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} / 3)% от максимального базового урона оружия, которое ассасин использует в данный момент.

If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g}, закончив свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, находится вне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g} свидетеля, свидетель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} / 3)% от максимального базового урона оружия, которое ассасин использует в данный момент.

traits.locale_text: If a witness does not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)</u>% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

languages.text: Wenn ein Zeuge des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g} nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} hat, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Assassinen endet, erleidet dieser Zeuge ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g} /3) % des maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Grundschadens{/g} der aktuellen Waffe des Assassinen.
languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Zeuge des Assassinen nicht in der {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} hat, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Assassinen endet, erleidet dieser Zeuge <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g} /3)</u> % des maximalen Grundschadens der aktuellen Waffe des Assassinen.

languages.text: Un témoin qui n'a pas l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de celui-ci subit ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} / 3) % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de base maximum infligés par l'arme actuelle de l'assassin.
languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Un témoin qui n'a pas l'Assassin dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de celui-ci subit <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} / 3)</u> % des dégâts de base maximum infligés par l'arme actuelle de l'Assassin.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，若刺客不在该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内，则该名敌人会受到额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于刺客当前武器最大基础伤害的（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}/3）%。
languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: 当刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，若刺客不在该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内，则该名敌人会受到额外伤害，等同于刺客当前武器最大基础伤害的<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}/3）</u>%。

languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)</u>% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.

languages.text: Si un testigo no tiene al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino, ese testigo sufre un ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} / 3) % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} básico máximo del arma que tenga equipada actualmente el asesino.
languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: Si un testigo no tiene al asesino dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino, ese testigo sufre un <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} / 3)</u> % del daño básico máximo del arma que tenga equipada actualmente el asesino.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時にアサシンが目撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線内{/g}に入っていない場合、その目撃者はアサシンの現在の武器の最大ベース{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}÷3）%を受ける。
languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

traits.locale_text: アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、目撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線内{/g}にアサシンが入っていない場合、その目撃者はアサシンの現在の武器の最大基本ダメージの<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g} / 3)</u>％を受ける。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdiğinde tanığın {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} değilse o tanık, Suikastçı'nın mevcut silahının verdiği maksimum taban {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} %({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} / 3) kadarına maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 3)% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.

languages.text: If a witness does not have the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the Assassin's current weapon.
